144111.content:
Sam fell on the floor, panting and covered with cold sweat from head to feet. His arms, his legs, his stomach...every single part of his body ached with the blows given by the practice swords of his "sworn brothers". Just moving a finger was agony for him. Rising up and dropping on a nearby seat was hell on earth, even in the coldest place known in the four Seven Kingdoms: The Wall.

"T-They want to kill me" he panted to one of his few friends in the Watch, Jon snow. Unlike Sam, the bastard son of Eddard Stark was athletic and lean, a true warrior who had easily delt with his own opponents in the training field.

"You just need some practice, that's all" said Jon as he pulled out his armor.

"Even if I trained for ten years I would not be able to do it" groaned Sam "I am not a warrior Jon"

"You are a sworn brother of the Watch. Your duty is to fight and so you must learn if you want to survive what comes from the other side of the Wall"

"Thanks for reminding me" Sam's eyes then noticed something as Jon bent over to pull off some parts of his leg armor. Peeking out of his friend's pants was a thick line of white, with a long, name-tag showing his name right over the waistband. Grinning to himself, Sam tip-toed the few paces between them and rested all fingers on the soft surface of Jon's tighty whities "Still, I don´t think swords are all there is. We could also use...THIS!"

144112221.content:
Jon’s tired eyes looked at the window and narrowed a little as they saw the sun slowly setting behind the wall. The evening was coming and behind it, the night. Few black brothers remained, but with the emergency recruits from the wildlings, Castle Black seemed to be, at least, mildly defended. Some of the queen’s soldiers and knights were in the fortress too, even if they only obeyed the command of Stannise’s wife.

No, that would be a lie. They didn´t realy obey her, but the priestress of the red god who always was by her side, the one whose beauty had left many speechless. The smart one’s were more weary though, since they had seen the powers she wielded. A dangerous woman no doubt, one who Jon had not idea what to think about. Her red hair remainded him of Ygrette, but there was something magical about her too, something that, strangely enough, attracted him towards her.

“Good evening commander”

Melisandre gently opened the door and stepped into the room. Inmediately, all the fire that lit it seemed to grow on her presence. She wore her usual crimson outift. The red clothing, the red gem on her collar, he red eyes. The wildlings said that Ygrette had been kissed by fire. If that was true, Jon didn´t want to know what the flames had done to the priestess.

“Lady Melisandre” said Jon before quickly looking back to the report.

“Please, Melisandre is enough. I am no lady, just a servant of the true god” said Melisandre as she aproached Jon “And since we both are going to fight against his foe, the lord of darkness, it is only fitting that we get to know each other, so we can rely on each other when the storm comes”

“Couldn´t we do this other time? I am bussy” said Jon as diplomaticaly as he could.

Melisandre chuckled “I don´t think you are Jon. I don´t need to use the flames to see when someone is nervous to talk to me and uses excuses to hide that feeling. Do I scare you?”

“I have faced wights, dead men and wildlings...” began Jon, trying to defend himself.

“That doesn´t answer my question” said Melisandre with a small smirk “Don´t worry, I know just the thing which will let you understand that even if I serve the lord of light, I am still human”

Suddenly Jon felt a tug on her pants and then soft fingers going inside them. He looked back in shock, just in time to see Melisandre smiling warmly at her while holding the whaistband of his snow white underwear on her hands.

“Like you westerosi say...it is wedgie time!” said Melisandre as she yanked Jon’s tighty whities so hard she almost lifted him off the floor.

“Ugh!” Jon grunted in pain while his brain still tried to comprehend what was going on. Melisandre, the red priestess...was wedgieing him?! Another strong pull finished all doubts about it but Jon could still do nothing as the red woman stretched his underwear farther and farther until they were far beyond his neck.

This wasn´t the first wedgie he had gotten. Robb and Sansa used to do this to him when they were younger and even Arya had a go or two, even if she was more playful than anything. Ygrette had given him more than one wedgie during their time together and he had given her some back too. But none of them pulled as hard or as skillfuly as Melisandre. She almost seemed to be an expert on this!

Melisandre must have been reading his mind, because she chuckled and gave another yank to his underwear “I had practice with the queen and some of her maidens, but they never seem to speak their mind when I yank their panties. They even seem eager for me to do it. So tell me, how am I doing?”
